verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> be to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> do <S%H1961>feed<s%> <S%H7462><s%> themselves! should <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks?<s%>

Ye <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and ye <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6785>wool,<s%> ye <S%H2076>kill<s%> them that are <S%H1277>fed:<s%> but ye <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H2470>diseased<s%> have ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have ye <S%H7495>healed<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have ye bound <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have ye brought <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have ye <S%H1245>sought<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost;<s%> but with <S%H2394>force<s%> and with <S%H6531>cruelty<s%> have ye <S%H7287>ruled<s%> them.

And they were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> because there is <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> when they were <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill:<s%> yea, my <S%H6629>flock<s%> was <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H1875>search<s%> or <S%H1245>seek<s%> after them.
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> ye <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and my <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> because there was <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did my <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H1875>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> for my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> but the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> themselves, and <S%H7462>fed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H6629>flock;<s%>
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O ye <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds;<s%> and I will <S%H1875>require<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> at their <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and cause them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H4480>feeding<s%> <S%H7462><s%> the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves any <S%H5750>more;<s%> for I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H6629>flock<s%> from their <S%H4480>mouth,<s%> <S%H6310><s%> that they may <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> for them.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I, even <S%H589>I,<s%> will both <S%H1875>search<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and seek them <S%H1239>out.<s%>

As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> seeketh <S%H1243>out<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that are <S%H6566>scattered;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I seek <S%H1239>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And I will bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>to<s%> their own <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> them <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H650>rivers,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the inhabited <S%H4186>places<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>

I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and upon the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall their <S%H5116>fold<s%> <S%H1961>be:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they <S%H7257>lie<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>fold,<s%> and in a <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> shall they <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> will <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will cause them to lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> that which was <S%H6>lost,<s%> and bring <S%H7725>again<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away,<s%> and will bind <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick:<s%> but I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H8082>fat<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong;<s%> I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them with <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And as for <S%H859>you,<s%> O my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle,<s%> between the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the he <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

Seemeth it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> <S%H4480>unto<s%> you to have eaten <S%H7462>up<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> but ye must tread <S%H7429>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of your <S%H4829>pastures?<s%> and to have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of the <S%H4950>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> but ye must <S%H7515>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>residue<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet?<s%>

And as for my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> they <S%H7462>eat<s%> that which ye have <S%H4823>trodden<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> that which ye have <S%H4833>fouled<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> even I, will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>cattle.<s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> ye have <S%H1920>thrust<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H5055>pushed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2470>diseased<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H413>abroad;<s%> <S%H2351><s%>

Therefore will I <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>prey;<s%> and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> and <S%H7716>cattle.<s%>

And I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them; <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with them a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and will cause the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3293>woods.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the places round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H1653>shower<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> in his <S%H6256>season;<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

And the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H983>safe<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H127>land,<s%> and shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4133>bands<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of those that <S%H5647>served<s%> themselves of them.

And they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them; but they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

And I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> for them a <S%H4302>plant<s%> of <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H622>consumed<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

Thus shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> them, and that <S%H1992>they,<s%> even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And <S%H859>ye<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> am your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
